title: Recruiting Players Plat 1+ for Ranked 5s team
body:
If you are interested in finding a team, post below and provide your:

Current Rank:
Desired Role:
Main Champions:
Time zone or Location:

Skype is a must have.

replies.body:
Current Rank: Faker
Desired Role: Mid, Top
Main Champions: Lulu, Xerath, Tanks.
Time zone or Location: Melbourne.
http://puu.sh/hjmuw.png
http://puu.sh/hEzdH.png
Lulu hype :^)

Plat 1
Support, Jng, Top
Sup mains: Thresh, leo, naut, morgana
Jng mains: Sejuani, vi, j4, maokai, naut, gragas
Top mains: Renek, Sejuani, Irelia, Maokai, Lissandra
Sydney

Current Rank: Plat 3 (been climbing quite quickly even with uni getting in the way)
Desired Role: ADC
Main Champions: Sivir, Jinx, Kalista and vayne currently, but can play any.
Time zone or Location: Melbourne

Current Rank: Platinum 2 (was demoted from Diamond last week after a bad slump, bouncing back though.)
Desired Role: ADC
Main Champions: Lucian is my best by far (hue) but can play all ADCs other than Ezreal and Draven.
Location: Melbourne
